Metadata: Part of the National Ocean Sciences Bowl, Orca Bowl is an annual Washington competition that challenges high-school students' knowledge of the world's oceans. Orca Bowl offers teachers a vehicle to teach sciences in an interdisciplinaâ€‹ry manner and provides access to marine educators and experts. All teams receive awards for participation in Orca Bowl. Top prizes include shipboard research experiences and a scholarship to the School of Oceanography.
